featured.text: In Samoa a woman is not considered attractive unless she weighs more than 200 pounds.
Through a projector, this attractive radio-alarm-clock is able to display the time onto a wall, ceiling, or anywhere __23__.
This tour package is very appealing, and that one looks _____ attractive.
Helen _____ with anger when she saw her boyfriend kissing an attractive girl.
Despite the economic and environmental hurdles, desalination is becoming increasingly attractive as human beings are using up fresh water from other sources.

definition.en_def: Pleasant or appealing to the senses or mind.
definition.example: She wore an attractive dress to the party.
